summary.span: 提供一种自定义重写 ASP.NET 代码访问安全策略的 ASP.NET 运行时行为的方法。

span.span: Provides a way to customize ASP.NET behavior at run time that overrides the ASP.NET code access security policy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在复杂的 Web 托管环境，如 SharePoint 和 Web 场，你可能需要扩展 ASP.NET 代码访问安全性策略。In complex Web hosting environments such as SharePoint and Web farms, you might have to extend the ASP.NET code access security policy. 通过扩展类型，可以实现重写 ASP.NET 代码访问安全策略的自定义安全策略行为。By extending the type, you can implement custom security policy behavior that overrides the ASP.NET code access security policy. ## 配置 HostSecurityPolicyResolver 类Configuring a HostSecurityPolicyResolver Class 在配置文件中，可以配置自定义通过添加实例属性的元素。In the configuration files, you can configure a custom instance by adding the attribute to the element. 属性可以设置的自定义名称为ASP.NET 将加载的类型。The attribute can be set to the name of the custom type that will be loaded by ASP.NET. 属性值包含派生类型的完全限定的名称。The attribute value contains the fully qualified name of the derived type. 默认情况下，[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]未设置此属性。By default, [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] does not set this attribute. 以下语法显示了如何配置属性：The following syntax shows how to configure the attribute: ``` ``` 属性中`trust`元素可以设置为一个字符串值，指示应使用部分信任配置文件中设置的命名的权限。The attribute in the `trust` element can be set to a string value that indicates which named permission set in a partial trust configuration file should be used. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 4 中设置此属性与"ASP.Net"。By default, ASP.NET 4 sets this attribute to "ASP.Net". 中的属性`trust`元素指示自定义ASP.NET 将加载的对象。The attribute in the `trust` element indicates the custom object that will be loaded by ASP.NET. 如果该属性设置为空字符串，该应用程序使用 ASP.NET 默认逻辑用于确定程序集的权限。If the attribute is set to an empty string, the application uses the ASP.NET default logic for determining the permissions for the assembly. Type 特性不能设置为 null 值。The type attribute cannot be set to a null value. > [!IMPORTANT] > 包含派生的程序集类型必须使用完全信任运行，因为自定义类型提供了 ASP.NET 可用于提升为完全信任程序集的信息。The assembly that contains a derived type must run with full trust, because the custom type provides information that ASP.NET can use to elevate assemblies to full trust. 一般情况下，应将部署在全局程序集缓存中，其中将使用完全信任运行的自定义策略冲突解决程序类型。In general, you should deploy a custom policy resolver type in the global assembly cache, where it will run with full trust. 此类实现时，必须重写方法。When you implement this class, you must override the method. 具体取决于实例的数据类型作为参数传递，该方法返回一个枚举值，指示要应用于程序集的安全策略。Depending on the instance that is passed as a parameter, the method returns an enumeration value that indicates the security policy to apply to the assembly. 一组可用的安全策略由枚举。The set of available security policies is determined by the enumeration.
